term.title: Ostwald ripening

item.text: Dissolution of small crystals or sol particles and the redeposition of the dissolved species on the surfaces of larger crystals or sol particles.

notes.item: The process occurs because smaller particles have a higher surface energy, hence higher total Gibbs energy, than larger particles, giving rise to an apparent higher solubility.
Modified from previous definition. The definition proposed here is recommended for its inclusion of sol particles.
